ComicInfo.Summary:
Beauty and the Beast!: Underground overlord Tyrannus kidnaps Betty and lures the Hulk into his subterranean kingdom, forcing the Hulk to do his bidding to keep Betty safe. The jade giant is powerless until Rick frees Betty, thus leaving the Hulk free to bring the house down on Tyrannus.
The Hordes of General Fang!: The Hulk thwarts a would-be Genghis Khan conqueror named General Fang from taking over the Asian province of Llhasa, and he only has to dress up as the Abominable Snowman once to do it.
ComicInfo.Title: Beauty and the Beast!; The Hordes of General Fang!
ComicInfo.Tags: Tyrannus,General Fang,United States Army,Communists,Subterraneans,People's Liberation Army,Betty Ross,Hulk,Thunderbolt Ross,Rick Jones
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
